main.*:
'''Celia''' is [[Ross Geller|Ross]]'s  date in "[[The One With The Stoned Guy]]" who takes an instant dislike to [[Marcel]] the monkey when he grabs her hair. In their next date Ross tries to talk dirty with Celia but can only manage to cuddle.  

Celia is a curator of insects at the museum, the girls refer to her as "the bug lady".

Celia was played by [[Melora Hardin]].
